item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Sig
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

ok im not going to lie its awful, everything unhandled has said and then there’s some more:
The green waves, make your own with the pen tool it will then give you greater control over them and allow you to do more with them such as add extra lines and include a nice effect over an image like perhaps a faction logo
Then its too bland, you need more there isn’t enough show in there, add something more in or take the man away, you are in the no mans land between acceptable and minimalism, its not a place you want to be with a sig.
The blend of colours is horrendous, there are too many colours in there, you need to change it. Make the man green and black with a sort of night vision esque filter over it, the text (if you are going to ignore unhandled’s advice and stick with it) will also need a colour change. Your colours should definitly be black and green, just keep that as a theme, use those lines to make the peice flow more effectively
that was a harsh review of the work but with those changes you can make something good you just need to learn the concept of flow and colour schemes

Read full topic

item.title: Modern Warfare 2 Sig
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I dunno what kind of filter you used for the guy, but it looks like a black man covered in semen.
The green to black gradient isn’t doing you any favours either.
Why don’t you try making your own Call Of Duty text, instead of copying and pasting one?
